casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

February, 1974

(February 14, 1974) The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v. John Irving, Also Known as John Yopp, Appellant.

Judgment unanimously affirmed. (See People v. Monsanto, 41 A D 2d 761.) (Appeal from judgment of Erie County Court convicting defendant of attempted burglary in the third degree.) Present — Marsh, P. J., Moule, Cardamone, Simons and Del Vecchio, JJ.
